scripts.html:minify: shx mkdir -p site && html-minifier-terser --input-dir site --output-dir site --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.html:typo: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const gl=require('glob'); const typogr=require('typogr'); gl.sync('site/**/*.html').forEach(f=>{const s=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(f, typogr.typogrify(s));});"
scripts.build: mkdocs build -d site && npm run postcss && npm run html:typo && npm run html:validate && npm run html:minify
